name: Sustained imaging rate
definition: Imaging rate at given resolution per microscope

name: Technician salary
definition: Total salary incl benefits for microscopist

name: Microscope uptime
definition: Fraction of calendar time producing good data

name: Reacquisition rate
definition: Expected fraction of volume to re-image

name: Sample yield
definition: Fraction of samples that pass QC

name: Expansion factor
definition: Linear expansion factor E; volume scales as E³

name: Consumables per mm³
definition: Sample prep, expanding, staining per tissue volume

name: Labor cost per mm³
definition: Human labor costs per original mm³

name: Sample depth
definition: Layers of Z in one sample
